name: ValentineWishes
0:
”Alexa, open Valentine Wishes”
”Alexa, Valentine Wishes”
”Alexa, Open Valentine Wishes and Wish Sofia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: valentine wishes
des:
Use this skill to deliver personalized messages for your loved ones. 

Each message is unique with a personal touch that includes both your and your valentine's names hidden in a romantic background music. 

You can simply say : 
 <Sender> wants to wish <Receiver>
 Wish <Receiver>
 Wish <Sender> from <Receiver>

Examples: 
 Wish Sofia
 Sam wants to wish Sofia
 Wish Sofia from Sam

In future versions of this skill, early adopters would get options to create customized messages that can be delivered through Alexa at a particular date and time. 

For now, enjoy this skill and surprise your Valentine with this sweet gesture.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
